poi.name: St. Martin's Cathedral
poi.description: A Gothic church dedicated to Saint Martin of Tours, part of the UNESCO World Heritage Site 'Frontiers of the Roman Empire -- The Lower German Limes'.

poi.name: Kasteel Montfoort
poi.description: A historic castle built in 1163 by Bishop Godefried van Rhenen to defend the Sticht of Utrecht from the Earldom of Holland.

poi.name: De Valk Windmill
poi.description: A traditional Dutch windmill located in Montfoort, showcasing the country's rich milling history.
